about_the_game:
Anomalous Deception is a first-person survival horror game created by HBunny.

IMMERSIVE STORY!

Taking place in an alternate late 1960s decades after WWII ended, the world seems even grimmer in fear of a nuclear war. The soviet union is the number one thriving superpower and is a force to be reckoned with.

You've been jammed shut-in the only communication you get is a radio that is a one-way conversation. You are equipped with a hazmat suit, a gas mask, a flashlight, and a backpack you are forbidden to open. Your mission is to infiltrate the hallway what lies ahead is a mystery, what will you discover in this abandoned bunker?

IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAY!

A hallway that is randomly generated for each playthrough, so it won't be the same the next time you play! Each event will play differently as you descend through the hallways of never-ending torment. Interact with the environment by scanning through the level and finding something interesting! Do not let it win; you must survive whatever lurks in there and learn its environment, skills, behavior, and more! Whatever you do, don't look back!

FEATURES

  • Randomly Generated Hallway
  • All Events Play Differently
  • Random Collectibles
  • Difficulty Increases When Progressing
  • A 20 minute timer for the demo

content_descriptors.notes:
References of violence/Intense violence

infrequent use of strong language

Offensive symbols

minimal blood

name: Anomalous Deception (Demo)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 / Radeon RX 5500
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 / Radeon RX 7900-XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A PSX-retro-style first-person survival horror game that takes place in an underground bunker that is randomly generated for each playthrough! Discover its secrets and mysteries of what lead you down there in the first place.
